Dialogue.Page: How can I help, my friend?

DialogueOption.Text: Why is everything here so worn down?

Dialogue.Page: An excellent question! The answer is simple: my clan uses exclusively biodegradable materials for non-essential structures!

What looks like sandstone here is actually a highly compacted nutrient mix held together with organic binding agents. It is carefully formulated to break down under exposure and enrich the soil over time.
...It can be a bit inconvenient having to constantly rebuild everything, though.
